+    def test_cat_padding(self):
+        x = torch.rand(13, 1)
+        y = torch.rand(17, 2)
+        z = torch.rand(19, 3)

+        for pad_value in [0, 0.5, 1]:

+            self.assertEqual(z, res1.narrow(0, 30, 19).narrow(1, 0, 3), 0)
+
+            expect2 = torch.ones(49, 3) * pad_value
